title: Schizoid
description: Unlock the full game now to earn gold medals in over 120 levels of the most co-op game ever! Schizoid was declared by Penny Arcade to be one of “The PAX 10” independent game winners! How far can you get in the endless Infinity Chamber? Wield the devastating Razorwire powerup, and try mastering the brain-melting Uberschizoid game mode. (Refunds not available on any surgery you may undertake to sever your corpus callosum while attempting to master Uberschizoid mode.) This game requires the Xbox 360 hard drive or the 512MB Memory Unit for storage. There are no refunds for this item. For more information, see www.xbox.com/live/accounts.

contentRating.label: E (Everyone)
disclaimers: Online Interactions Not Rated by the ESRB

childDownloads.title: Trial Game - Schizoid
childDownloads.description: The most co-op game ever! Schizoid was declared by Penny Arcade to be one of “The PAX 10” independent game winners! 1 or 2 players control red and blue ships, ramming red and blue enemies that charge at the player of the opposite color. Reflexes and smarts are both important, but sharp teamwork gives a better chance of earning gold medals! This game requires the Xbox 360 hard drive or the 512MB Memory Unit for storage.

childDownloads.title: Schizoid -  Flitts and Skulks Theme
childDownloads.description: Schizoid’s Flitts and Skulks are a notable study in contrasting behavior.  Each Flitt moves in a random fashion, hoping beyond hope that the seconds will pass harmlessly until it can evolve into a Schiz.  Skulks, on the other hand, exhibit a passive-aggressive modality, tracking you relentlessly with their hairpin turning ability – until they see a threat, at which point they slide away, perhaps quietly whistling in the secret Skulk whistle-language, hoping you never noticed them.  Anyway, they’re here in this Theme, for your chasing-and-avoiding enjoyment. There are no refunds for this item. For more information, see www.xbox.com/live/accounts.

childDownloads.title: Schizoid - Breeders and Scorpios Theme
childDownloads.description: Remember that fear?  That fear you get when you’re playing Schizoid and you see Breeders crawling off the edge of the screen, just knowing they’re about to lay a dozen eggs that will hatch into Scorpios that chase you relentlessly?  Now you can enjoy the fear all day long with the Breeders and Scorpios Theme.  There are no refunds for this item. For more information, see www.xbox.com/live/accounts.

childDownloads.title: Schizoid - Flitts and Skulks Picture Pack
childDownloads.description: Flitts and Skulks.  Split opposites.  Random jittering versus relentless tracking.  Show the world which you are with a new gamerpic – the Red Flitt, Blue Flitt, Red Skulk, Blue Skulk, and an abstract rendering of the cruel claws of a Red Scorpio. There are no refunds for this item. For more information, see www.xbox.com/live/accounts.

childDownloads.title: Schizoid - Heroes and Schizzes Picture Pack
childDownloads.description: Show off your Schizoid nature with a new gamerpic!  Choose from the heroic Red or Blue player ships, a yellow Mine, the piercing stare of the Schiz, or a specially available concept art rendering of the Schiz! There are no refunds for this item. For more information, see www.xbox.com/live/accounts.

childDownloads.title: Schizoid - Heroes Theme
childDownloads.description: The most co-op theme pack ever!  Featuring the red and blue Schizoid player ships, a dreaded Schiz, and a Black Hole that’s sucking down Breeders, Scorpios, Flitts, and two treacherous Skulks. There are no refunds for this item. For more information, see www.xbox.com/live/accounts.

childDownloads.title: Schizoid - Omnibreeders and Progeny Picture Pack
childDownloads.description: Breeders are the scary ones.  They have this ability to immediately focus all your attention on smashing them before they lay so many eggs that you’re overwhelmed. There are no refunds for this item. For more information, see www.xbox.com/live/accounts.
